price: በመርከቦች ውስጥ በተሳፈሩ ጊዜም አላህን መገዛትን ለእርሱ ብቻ ያጠሩ ኾነው ይጠሩታል፡፡ ወደ የብስ (በማውጣት) ባዳናቸው ጊዜም ወዲያውኑ እነርሱ (ጣዖትን) ያጋራሉ፡፡
arabic: فَإِذَا رَكِبُواْ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ دَعَوُاْ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ فَلَمَّا نَجَّىٰهُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡبَرِّ إِذَا هُمۡ يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā rakibū fī al-ful'ki daʿawū al-laha mukh'liṣīna lahu al-dīna falammā najjāhum ilā al-bari idhā hum yush'rikūna
